Texts.Chs: 人们并不清楚艾肯是如何接触到古人风格的全息图的。他们否认耕耘者的存在，却在他们的古老建筑中使用古代技术。也许这些生命比我们原来想象的要古老得多，他们与古人一起生活，并且知道他们的真实情况是什么？这一切都太令人兴奋了。
Texts.Eng: It isn't well known how X'i have access to Ancient-style holograms. They deny the existence of the Cultivator, yet use Ancient technology in their old structures. Perhaps these beings are far, far older than we originally thought and lived alongside Ancients, and know what they were truly like? It is all so exciting.

Texts.Chs: 人们并不清楚艾肯是如何接触到古人风格的全息图的。他们否认耕耘者的存在，却在他们的古老建筑中使用古代技术。也许这些生命比我们原来想象的要古老得多，他们与古人一起生活，并且知道他们的真实情况是什么？这一切都太令人兴奋了。当然，鉴于人们很少遇到艾肯人，证明任何事情都会相当困难。而且找到一个能说普通话并能讲述古代历史的艾肯人简直就是天方夜谭。
Texts.Eng: It isn't well known how X'i have access to Ancient-style holograms. They deny the existence of the Cultivator, yet use Ancient technology in their old structures. Perhaps these beings are far, far older than we originally thought and lived alongside Ancients, and know what they were truly like? It is all so exciting. Proving anything, of course, will prove quite difficult given how seldom one encounters a X'i. Finding one that can speak common and is able to recount ancient history is of the highest level of improbability.

Texts.Chs: 当然，鉴于人们很少遇到艾肯人，证明任何事情都会相当困难。而且找到一个能说普通话并能讲述古代历史的艾肯人简直就是天方夜谭。
Texts.Eng: Proving anything, of course, will prove quite difficult given how seldom one encounters a X'i. Finding one that can speak common and is able to recount ancient history is of the highest level of improbability.
